instructions.ar: انعطف يمينا لتبقى على Cool highway (Ref1)
instructions.da: Drej til højre videre ad Cool highway (Ref1)
instructions.en: Turn right to stay on Cool highway (Ref1)
instructions.es: Cruza a laderecha en Cool highway (Ref1)
instructions.es-ES: Cruce a la derecha en Cool highway (Ref1)
instructions.fi: Käänny oikeall(e/a) pysyäksesi tiellä Cool highway (Ref1)
instructions.fr: Tourner à droite pour rester sur Cool highway (Ref1)
instructions.he: פנה ימינה כדי להישאר בCool highway (Ref1)
instructions.hu: Forduljon jobbra és maradjon a Cool highway (Ref1) szakaszon
instructions.it: Gira a destra per stare su Cool highway (Ref1)
instructions.ja: 右に曲がり、Cool highway(Ref1)を進む
instructions.ko: 우회전 회전하고 Cool highway (Ref1)로 직진해 주세요.
instructions.my: Cool highway( Ref1)​ပေါ်တွင်နေရန် ညာဘက်ကိုလှည့်ပါ
instructions.nl: Sla rechts om op Cool highway (Ref1) te blijven
instructions.no: Ta til høyre for å bli værende på Cool highway (Ref1)
instructions.pl: Skręć w prawo, aby pozostać na Cool highway (Ref1)
instructions.pt-BR: Vire à direita para manter-se na Cool highway (Ref1)
instructions.pt-PT: Vire à direita para se manter em Cool highway (Ref1)
instructions.sv: Sväng höger och fortsätt på Cool highway (Ref1)
instructions.tr: Cool highway (Ref1) üzerinde kalmak için sağ yöne dön
instructions.vi: Quẹo phải để chạy tiếp trên Cool highway (Ref1)
instructions.yo: Tan-an ọtun lati duro si Cool highway (Ref1)
instructions.zh-Hans: 在Cool highway（Ref1）上继续向右行驶
